display_long_description:
**Travel the stars. Care for alien plants. Uncover the mysteries hidden deep at the center of the universe.**

Turn your home into a starship bound for adventure as you take flight in a brand new kind of mixed reality experience where the room you play in comes along on the adventure with you. 
[media]
🚀 Customize your starship to fit whatever room you want to play in. 

🪐 Travel to new planets and explore the surface with your lander.

🌱 Help your plants grow by taking a ride into their dreams and see new worlds through their eyes.

These special plants need your help to restore balance to their universe!


[media]
**We'll need your help to operate the starship!**
[media]
**Every plant has its own personality and needs.**
[media]
**Whoa! WHERE AM I?!**
